email.incomingsupport.body1.en: A customer has sent the following info
email.incomingsupport.body1.translation: En kunde har sendt følgende oplysninger

email.secret_link.link_works_once.en: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.secret_link.link_works_once.translation: Dette link virker kun én gang. Efter visning slettes hemmeligheden permanent.

email.welcome.subject.en: Welcome to %{product_name} - Please verify your email

email.welcome.title.translation: Du er inviteret til at deltage i %{product_name}!

email.welcome.verify_prompt.en: Please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
email.welcome.verify_prompt.translation: Bekræft venligst din e-mailadresse ved at klikke på linket nedenfor:

email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.translation: Eller kopier og indsæt dette link:

email.welcome.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}. If you did not create an account, you can safely ignore this message.
email.welcome.postscript.translation: P.S. Denne e-mail blev sendt til %{email_address}. Hvis du ikke forventede denne invitation, kan du roligt ignorere denne besked.

email.password_request.request_notice.en: We received a request to reset your password for %{product_name}.
email.password_request.request_notice.translation: Vi modtog en anmodning om at nulstille din adgangskode til %{product_name}.

email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.translation: Eller kopier og indsæt dette link:

email.password_request.ignore_notice.en: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
email.password_request.ignore_notice.translation: Hvis du ikke anmodede om en nulstilling af adgangskode, kan du roligt ignorere denne e-mail.

email.password_request.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.
email.password_request.postscript.translation: P.S. Denne e-mail blev sendt til %{email_address}.

email.magic_link.request_notice.en: You requested a login link for your %{product_name} account.
email.magic_link.request_notice.translation: Du har anmodet om et login-link til din %{product_name}-konto.

email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.translation: Eller kopiér og indsæt dette link:

email.magic_link.expiration_notice.en: This link will expire in 15 minutes.

email.magic_link.ignore_notice.en: If you did not request this link, you can safely ignore this email.
email.magic_link.ignore_notice.translation: Hvis du ikke har anmodet om dette link, kan du trygt ignorere denne e-mail.

email.magic_link.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.
email.magic_link.postscript.translation: P.S. Denne e-mail blev sendt til %{email_address}.

email.incoming_secret.subject.translation: Du har modtaget en hemmelig besked

email.incoming_secret.received_message.translation: Du har modtaget en sikker besked:

email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.en: Someone has sent you a secure message through %{display_domain}.
email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.translation: Nogen har sendt dig en sikker besked via %{display_domain}.

email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.en: To view this secret, click the link below:
email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.translation: For at se denne hemmelighed skal du klikke på linket nedenfor:

email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.en: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.translation: Dette link virker kun én gang. Efter visning slettes hemmeligheden permanent.

email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.en: This is an automated notification. No action is required.
email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.translation: Dette er en automatisk notifikation. Ingen handling er påkrævet.

email.expiration_warning.subject.en: Your secret link will expire soon

email.expiration_warning.expires_in.en: Your secret link will expire in %{time_remaining}

email.expiration_warning.view_button.en: View your secret before it expires
email.expiration_warning.view_button.translation: Se din hemmelighed før den udløber

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.en: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.translation: Efter udløb slettes hemmeligheden permanent og kan ikke gendannes.

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.en: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted.

email.organization_invitation.subject.translation: Du er inviteret til at deltage i %{organization_name}

email.organization_invitation.title.translation: Du er inviteret til at deltage i %{organization_name}!

email.organization_invitation.body.en: %{inviter_email} has invited you to join "%{organization_name}" as %{role_description}.
email.organization_invitation.body.translation: %{inviter_email} har inviteret dig til at deltage i "%{organization_name}" som %{role_description}.

email.organization_invitation.link_instr.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.organization_invitation.link_instr.translation: Eller kopier og indsæt dette link:

email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.en: This invitation will expire in %{days} days.

email.organization_invitation.decline_in.en: If you don't want to join, you can simply ignore this email or decline the invitation.
email.organization_invitation.decline_in.translation: Hvis du ikke vil deltage, kan du blot ignorere denne e-mail eller afslå invitationen.

email.organization_invitation.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{invited_email}. If you weren't expecting this invitation, you can safely ignore this message.
email.organization_invitation.postscript.translation: P.S. Denne e-mail blev sendt til %{invited_email}. Hvis du ikke forventede denne invitation, kan du roligt ignorere denne besked.

email.password_changed.body.en: Your password for %{product_name} was changed on %{date} at %{time}.
email.password_changed.body.translation: Din adgangskode til %{product_name} blev ændret den %{date} kl. %{time}.

email.password_changed.security_notice.en: If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password and contacting support.
email.password_changed.security_notice.translation: Hvis du ikke foretog denne ændring, bedes du sikre din konto med det samme ved at nulstille din adgangskode og kontakte support.

email.email_changed.body.en: The email address for your %{product_name} account was changed to %{new_email_masked} on %{date}.
email.email_changed.body.translation: E-mailadressen til din %{product_name}-konto blev ændret til %{new_email_masked} den %{date}.

email.email_changed.security_notice.en: If you did not make this change, please contact support immediately as your account may be compromised.
email.email_changed.security_notice.translation: Hvis du ikke foretog denne ændring, bedes du kontakte support med det samme, da din konto kan være kompromitteret.

email.email_change_confirmation.body.en: Please verify this email address to complete the change for your %{product_name} account.
email.email_change_confirmation.body.translation: Bekræft venligst denne e-mailadresse for at fuldføre ændringen af din %{product_name}-konto.

email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.translation: Eller kopier og indsæt dette link:

email.mfa_enabled.body.en: Two-factor authentication was enabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.
email.mfa_enabled.body.translation: To-faktor-autentificering blev aktiveret for din %{product_name}-konto den %{date}.

email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.en: Your account is now more secure. You will need to enter a verification code from your authenticator app when signing in.
email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.translation: Din konto er nu mere sikker. Du skal indtaste en bekræftelseskode fra din autentificeringsapp, når du logger ind.

email.mfa_disabled.body.en: Two-factor authentication was disabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.
email.mfa_disabled.body.translation: To-faktor-autentificering blev deaktiveret for din %{product_name}-konto den %{date}.

email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.en: Your account is now less secure. If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately.
email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.translation: Din konto er nu mindre sikker. Hvis du ikke foretog denne ændring, bedes du sikre din konto med det samme.

email.new_login_alert.body.en: A new sign-in to your %{product_name} account was detected on %{date} at %{time}.
email.new_login_alert.body.translation: Et nyt login til din %{product_name}-konto blev registreret den %{date} kl. %{time}.

email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.en: If this wasn't you, your account may be compromised.
email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.translation: Hvis dette ikke var dig, kan din konto være kompromitteret.

email.member_removed.body.en: You have been removed from the organization "%{organization_name}" on %{product_name}.
email.member_removed.body.translation: Du er blevet fjernet fra organisationen "%{organization_name}" på %{product_name}.

email.role_changed.body.en: Your role in "%{organization_name}" has been changed from %{old_role} to %{new_role}.
email.role_changed.body.translation: Din rolle i "%{organization_name}" er blevet ændret fra %{old_role} til %{new_role}.

email.organization_deleted.body.en: The organization "%{organization_name}" has been deleted from %{product_name}. All associated data has been removed.
email.organization_deleted.body.translation: Organisationen "%{organization_name}" er blevet slettet fra %{product_name}. Alle tilknyttede data er blevet fjernet.

email.payment_receipt.body.en: Thank you for your payment. Here are your payment details:
email.payment_receipt.body.translation: Tak for din betaling. Her er dine betalingsoplysninger:

email.payment_failed.body.en: We were unable to process your payment for %{product_name}. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.
email.payment_failed.body.translation: Vi kunne ikke behandle din betaling for %{product_name}. Opdater venligst din betalingsmetode for at undgå serviceafbrydelse.

email.trial_expiring.body.en: Your free trial of %{product_name} will expire in %{days_remaining} days. Upgrade now to keep access to all features.
email.trial_expiring.body.translation: Din gratis prøveperiode af %{product_name} udløber om %{days_remaining} dage. Opgrader nu for at bevare adgang til alle funktioner.

email.subscription_changed.body.en: Your %{product_name} subscription has been changed from %{old_plan} to %{new_plan}.
email.subscription_changed.body.translation: Dit %{product_name}-abonnement er blevet ændret fra %{old_plan} til %{new_plan}.
